original_text:
The fierce anger of the Lord will not turn back
    until he has executed and accomplished
    the intentions of his mind.
In the latter days you will understand this.
korean_text: 여호와의 진노는 그의 마음의 뜻한 바를 행하여 이루기까지는 돌이키지 아니하나니 너희가 끝날에 그것을 깨달으리라

sentences.original_text: The fierce anger of the Lord will not turn back
until he has executed and accomplished the intentions of his mind.
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그 마음의 경륜을 이루어 행할 때까지는

sentences.original_text: In the latter days you will understand this.
